cmp: 虫 (insect/worm, an animal/an invertebrate/a worm/an insect)
mng: barbarian, bullying, very, quite, rough, reckless

exm.mng: to act rashly, to act precipitously regardless of the consequences, reckless, foolhardy, daredevil
barbarian, slave servant, (old) contemptuous term for people from southern China (used by northern Chinese people)
common term for non-Han peoples in former times, not exclusively derogatory, barbarian
to pester endlessly (idiom); an annoying troublemaker
